titleStmt.title: The principles of Christian religion Proved by scripture, propounded by questions and answers: short for memory, plain for the meanest capacity, and profitable for all. Imprimatur Charles Herle.
titleStmt.author: Gouge, Thomas, 1605-1681.
J. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.L. for Samuel Man, at the Swan in Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 939 as Wing G1370, and on reel 1948 as Wing H77A. Both entries cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 939), and the Bodleian Library (reel 1948).

place.placeName: the Swan in Pauls Church yard
